title: Little Elliot, Big Family
description: Elliot and Mouse are back in Mike Curato's Little Elliot, Big Family ! And this time, Elliot finds more than a friendâ€•he finds a family.When Mouse heads off to a family reunion, Little Elliot decides go for a walk. As he explores each busy street, he sees families in all shapes and sizes. In a city of millions, Little Elliot feels very much alone-until he finds he has a family of his own!
author: Mike Curato
